segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, her hand open and waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel her excitement just by looking at her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar, he doesn’t even notice her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen trying to get cookies like this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse, and she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little bad for her—she’s just a kid, but this is so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a mix of innocence and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
